description: Listed only by Irwin, who says: A String of 2' on the manuals, and perhaps 4' on the pedals, conforming in loudness and timbre to the 4' and 8' manual Strings, with which it is usually combined, probably in a large String division.
examplesDescription: Viol 15th 4', Pedal; Convention Hall, Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA; Midmer-Losh 1929-32.
